entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Kangiqsujuaq
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:11 PM EST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -14.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kangiqsujuaq Airport 3:00 PM EST Saturday 04 March 2023
Temperature: -14.0°C
Pressure: 100.6 kPa
Humidity: 83 %
Wind Chill: -29
Dewpoint: -16.3°C
Wind: N 72 km/h gust 85 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Blizzard. Temperature rising to minus 9 by morning.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending this evening then periods of snow. Wind northwest 60 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 40 gusting to 70 early this evening then to 20 gusting to 40 late this evening. Temperature rising to minus 9 by morning. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 9.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill near minus 17. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Light snow. Temperature steady near minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning overnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 04 March 2023
